doc://swiftinsg/tutorials/Firey-Flag-Rai.title: Building a Collaborative Flag Raising app

abstract.text: The only appropriate way to bring the curriculum to a close is a flag raising app. We’ve been building up to this moment for over 20 lessons, it all culminates in this, a collaborative, customisable, absolutely ridiculous flag raising app.
, create a grid of flags that allow the users to select and change the flag.
